lead_paragraph: MORRISON--Richard. We mourn the loss of our partner, colleague and friend Richard Morrison, who suffered a heart attack and passed away on January 4. He was an important member of Weil, Gotshal & Manges LLP for nearly 30 years, and was deeply devoted to his work, colleagues and clients. As Managing Partner of Weil's Miami office and a longstanding partner in our Real Estate practice, Richard was instrumental in the development of Weil's presence in Miami and was also integral in helping to shape our global Real Estate practice. Richard split his time between our Miami and New York offices, and was known and loved by partners, associates and staff across all of Weil's offices. He graduated with a B.A. from Vanderbilt University in 1981 and earned a J.D. from the University of Florida's Levin College of Law in 1984. We will remember Richard with the utmost respect and admiration, and we offer our deepest sympathy to his family; he will be greatly missed by his many friends and colleagues at Weil. 1/3
